nodes.text: A'kiian "Maleficus" Bloodlight was a pilot who worked for the Black Sun crime syndicate during the Galactic Civil War. By the time of the Battle of Yavin, the Black Sun formed an alliance with the Detritus Satellites, a group of sentient Vulture-class droid scavengers active in the Dantooine system. Around 1 ABY, a spacer found an information storage device in the remains of a destroyed starfighter in the Dantooine system. It contained a private message from Bloodlight. In this message, Bloodlight voiced a strong disapproval of an alliance agreement between Black Sun and the Detritus Satellites. Bloodlight regretted that the agreement included a non-aggression pact, but hoped that it would be possible to destroy a few droid starfighters "under the radar".
A'kiian "Maleficus" Bloodlight is the author of a message found on a rare information storage deviced named "A Log" that can be looted from starfighters in the Dantooine system in Star Wars Galaxies.
